upgrades.title: Stronger Cursor
upgrades.description: Makes your cursor stronger, gaining +1 Duck per click (DPC).

upgrades.title: Duck Nest
upgrades.description: A cozy duck nest raising little ducklings, who happily multiply. Grants +1 Duck per second (DPS).

upgrades.title: Golden Duck Statue
upgrades.description: A golden duck statue ducks can admire, inspiring them to appear faster, increasing Duck spawn speed by +5%.

upgrades.title: Quaking Speaker
upgrades.description: A quaking speaker that ducks cannot resist, attracting more friends. Increases the maximum number of ducks in the pool by 1.

upgrades.title: Reinforced Cursor
upgrades.description: A heavier cursor making each click more impactful, granting +0.01% Ducks per click multiplier.

upgrades.title: Duck Coop
upgrades.description: Keeps the duck population growing more steadily, +0.01% Ducks per second multiplier.

upgrades.title: Duck Beacon
upgrades.description: A glowing marker visible to ducks from far away. Grants +0.5% chance for +1 extra duck to spawn. Chance stacks past 100%, guaranteeing additional ducks with leftover chance for even more.

enhancements.title: Orange Duck
enhancements.description: Changes the Duck color to orange, granting +25 Ducks per click (DPC).

enhancements.title: Yellow Pool
enhancements.description: Changes the pool color to yellow, making all Ducks just a little bit more premium, granting +65 Ducks per click (DPC).

enhancements.title: Magical Auto Clicker +1
enhancements.description: Spawns a magical auto clicker, which clicks Ducks for you, though starts off pretty slow.

enhancements.title: Mega Duck Feeder
enhancements.description: A massive feeder that no Duck can resist, permanently increases Ducks per second by +25.

enhancements.title: Radiant Plumage
enhancements.description: Increases the chance of a shiny Duck appearing by +0.01%, click one and watch the pond sparkle with wealth!

enhancements.title: Golden Strong Cursor
enhancements.description: Forged from pure gold, makes the Strong Cursor upgrade improved to +5 Ducks per click.

enhancements.title: Luxury Nesting Grounds
enhancements.description: Makes the duck nests more luxurious, making the Duck Nest upgrade improve to +3 Ducks per second.

enhancements.title: Fortune Feathers
enhancements.description: Luck seems to drift gently across the pond. Increases the critical chance by +0.5%.

enhancements.title: Auto Clicker Speed +1
enhancements.description: Increases the speed of the magical auto clicker by +1.

enhancements.title: Purple Duck
enhancements.description: Changes the Duck color to purple, granting +150 Ducks per click (DPC).

enhancements.title: Feather Fountain
enhancements.description: A fountain of magical feathers keeps the Ducks entertained, increasing Ducks per second by +65.

enhancements.title: Quack Amplifier
enhancements.description: Every quack resonates across the pond with extra force, granting x1.2 Ducks per click permanently.

enhancements.title: Duck Magnet
enhancements.description: Ducks from nearby ponds mysteriously find their way here, permanently increases Ducks per second by +200.

enhancements.title: Hot Pink Pool
enhancements.description: Changes the pool color to hot pink, making all Ducks feel like divas, granting +400 Ducks per click (DPC).

enhancements.title: Rubber Duck Army
enhancements.description: Here to serve and protect the duck empire, granting +300 DPS and +300 DPC permanently.

enhancements.title: Radiant Plumage II
enhancements.description: Increases the chance of a shiny Duck appearing by +0.01%, click one and watch the pond sparkle with wealth more fabulously!

enhancements.title: Turquoise Duck
enhancements.description: Changes the Duck color to turquoise, looks like the ocean, granting +800 Ducks per click (DPC).

enhancements.title: Fortune Feathers II
enhancements.description: Luck seems to drift gently across the pond. Increases the critical chance by +0.5%.

enhancements.title: Duck Heater
enhancements.description: Makes the ducks feel nice and warm, especially perfect for the winter season. Gives +900 DPS.

enhancements.title: Bread Storm Machine
enhancements.description: A magical machine that makes it literally rain bread, though the ducks aren't complaining. Gives +500 DPS and +500 DPC

enhancements.title: Coral Pool
enhancements.description: Changes the pool color to a nice coral color, making all Ducks feel euphoric. Grants +1000 Ducks per click (DPC).

enhancements.title: Duck DLC
enhancements.description: Adds an expansion to the game, giving more ducks. That's it. Gives +1150 Ducks per second.

enhancements.title: Magical Auto Clicker +1
enhancements.description: Spawns another magical auto clicker, which clicks Ducks for you, though starts off pretty slow.

enhancements.title: Duck CEO
enhancements.description: The ducks elected a leader. things got organized fast. Grants +750 DPS and +750 DPC

enhancements.title: Hydro-Quack Pump
enhancements.description: Pressurizes the pond to optimal duck density. Grants +1400 Ducks per click.

enhancements.title: Flock Router
enhancements.description: Redirects incoming duck traffic. Gives +1550 Ducks per second.

enhancements.title: Pond Overclocker
enhancements.description: Overclocks the pond. Warning: may exceed recommended duck limits. Gives +1700 Ducks per click.

enhancements.title: Auto Clicker Speed +1
enhancements.description: Increases the speed of the magical auto clicker by +1.

enhancements.title: Fortune Feathers III
enhancements.description: Luck seems to drift gently across the pond. Increases the critical chance by +0.5%.
